plot: A pensioner visits his neglected son. A nurse meets a soldier fiancé in France. A duke enlists as a private.
title: God Bless Our Red, White and Blue
plot_es: A pensioner visits his neglected son. A nurse meets a soldier fiancé in France. A duke enlists as a private.
original_name: God Bless Our Red, White and Blue
plot_en: A pensioner visits his neglected son. A nurse meets a soldier fiancé in France. A duke enlists as a private.
